personalInfo.residence: Lakeland, FL; plays out of Lone Palm GC
personalInfo.education: University of Miami, University of Florida (1994, Political Science)

tourBios.exmtStatus: 30th BUY.COM TOUR Qualifier at 1999 PGA TOUR Qualifying Tournament
tourBios.otherInfo: Qualified for BUY.COM TOUR in 1999, but played only five times...member of the PGA TOUR in 1998...tied for 24th at the 1998 Nissan Open, his best finish of the season...ranked 199th on the 1998 money list with $71,495...made only three starts on the PGA TOUR in 1999, but one resulted in a T10 at the Doral Ryder Open...played on the Canadian Tour 1994-1997...won three times in Canada: 1995 Infiniti Championship, 1996 BC TEL Pacific Open and 1997 Canadian PGA Championship...has two holes-in-one during competitive rounds...medalist of the 1993 SEC Championship Tournament...member of University of Florida 1993 NCAA Championship team...played on the same 1993 University of Florida team as Brian Gay and Chris Couch...All-America selection in 1992-93...transferred to Florida after the University of Miami dropped its golf program.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T2nd in 2000 at the BUY.COM Louisiana Open.
